Networks.Name: Ethereum
Networks.Description: A decentralized open-source blockchain with smart contracts.

Networks.Name: Bitcoin
Networks.Description: The first decentralized cryptocurrency based on blockchain.

Networks.Name: Solana
Networks.Description: A high-performance blockchain designed for scalability and low latency.

Networks.Name: Polygon
Networks.Description: A scalability solution for Ethereum, focused on secondary networks.

Networks.Name: Cardano
Networks.Description: A proof-of-stake blockchain with a focus on sustainability and interoperability.

contractCharacteristics.name: Burn
contractCharacteristics.description: Allows tokens to be permanently removed from circulation.

contractCharacteristics.name: Mint
contractCharacteristics.description: Enables the creation of new tokens to increase supply.

contractCharacteristics.name: Decimals
contractCharacteristics.description: Defines the number of decimal places a token can have.

contractCharacteristics.name: Tax
contractCharacteristics.description: Applies a transaction fee on transfers, usually for rewards or liquidity.

contractCharacteristics.name: Permit
contractCharacteristics.description: Allows gasless approvals using off-chain signatures.

contractCharacteristics.name: Token Recovery
contractCharacteristics.description: Enables the retrieval of accidentally sent tokens.

contractCharacteristics.name: Reflection
contractCharacteristics.description: Automatically distributes a percentage of transactions to token holders.

contractCharacteristics.name: Liquidity Management
contractCharacteristics.description: Manages liquidity pools to ensure efficient trading.

contractCharacteristics.name: Auto-swap
contractCharacteristics.description: Automatically converts tokens to another asset during transactions.

contractCharacteristics.name: Access
contractCharacteristics.description: Controls who can perform certain actions within the contract.

contractCharacteristics.name: Supply
contractCharacteristics.description: Defines whether the token supply is fixed or can be changed.

contractTypes.name: Fungible Token
contractTypes.description: A fungible token that can be exchanged for another of the same type, such as ERC-20.

contractTypes.name: Advanced Fungible Token
contractTypes.description: An advanced fungible token, such as ERC-777, which allows for additional functionalities, such as hooks in transactions.

contractTypes.name: Non-Fungible Token
contractTypes.description: A non-fungible token that represents a unique asset, such as ERC-721.

contractTypes.name: Semi-Fungible Token
contractTypes.description: A semi-fungible token that can act as fungible or non-fungible, such as ERC-1155.

contractVariants.name: Basic Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Simple contract with no added features.

contractVariants.name: Basic Advanced Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Simple contract with no added features.

contractVariants.name: Basic Non-Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Simple contract with no added features.

contractVariants.name: Basic Semi-Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Simple contract with no added features.

contractVariants.name: Common Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: It has supply control and token recovery functions. It has a maximum limit of tokens.

contractVariants.name: Common Advanced Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: It has supply control and token recovery functions. It has a maximum limit of tokens.

contractVariants.name: Common Semi-Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: It has supply control and token recovery functions. It has a maximum limit of tokens.

contractVariants.name: Tax Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: A fee is applied to each transaction.

contractVariants.name: Tax Advanced Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: A fee is applied to each transaction.

contractVariants.name: Deflation Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Reduces the number of tokens available.

contractVariants.name: Deflation Advanced Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Reduces the number of tokens available.

contractVariants.name: Deflation Non-Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Reduces the number of tokens available.

contractVariants.name: Deflation Semi-Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Reduces the number of tokens available.

contractVariants.name: Liquidity Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: It applies a fee to each transaction and uses the taxed amount to add liquidity to the token.

contractVariants.name: Liquidity Advanced Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: It applies a fee to each transaction and uses the taxed amount to add liquidity to the token.

contractVariants.name: Buyback Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: It applies a fee to each transaction and uses the taxed amount to buy and burn the token.

contractVariants.name: Buyback Advanced Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: It applies a fee to each transaction and uses the taxed amount to buy and burn the token.

contractVariants.name: Reflection Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: It applies a fee to each transaction and uses the amount to distribute among other token holders.

contractVariants.name: Reflection Advanced Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: It applies a fee to each transaction and uses the amount to distribute among other token holders.

contractVariants.name: Unlimited Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Similar to common, but controlled through user categories instead of a specific user and allows you to change the balance of an account that does not have an allowance.

contractVariants.name: Unlimited Advanced Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Similar to common, but controlled through user categories instead of a specific user and allows you to change the balance of an account that does not have an allowance.

contractVariants.name: Custom Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Personalized variant for Fungible Token.

contractVariants.name: Custom Advanced Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Personalized variant for Advanced Fungible Token.

contractVariants.name: Custom Non-Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Personalized variant for Non-Fungible Token.

contractVariants.name: Custom Semi-Fungible Token
contractVariants.description: Personalized variant for Semi-Fungible Token.

ContractFeatures.name: Access
ContractFeatures.description: Defines whether the token has access control mechanisms.

ContractFeatures.name: Anti-Whale
ContractFeatures.description: Limits large transactions to prevent market manipulation.

ContractFeatures.name: Auto-Swap
ContractFeatures.description: Allows automatic token swapping upon transaction execution.

ContractFeatures.name: Burn
ContractFeatures.description: Allows token burning to reduce supply.

ContractFeatures.name: Circulation
ContractFeatures.description: Indicates whether the token has circulation controls.

ContractFeatures.name: Decimals
ContractFeatures.description: Defines the decimal precision of the token.

ContractFeatures.name: Enumerable
ContractFeatures.description: Provides enumeration capabilities for NFTs.

ContractFeatures.name: Flash Mint
ContractFeatures.description: Enables the ability to mint tokens within a single transaction, provided they are returned.

ContractFeatures.name: Transfer Hooks
ContractFeatures.description: Allows execution of logic before or after a transfer operation.

ContractFeatures.name: Liquidity Management
ContractFeatures.description: Provides built-in liquidity management mechanisms.

ContractFeatures.name: Mint
ContractFeatures.description: Allows new tokens to be minted.

ContractFeatures.name: Name
ContractFeatures.description: The human-readable name of the token.

ContractFeatures.name: Pausable
ContractFeatures.description: Allows pausing of token transfers.

ContractFeatures.name: Permission
ContractFeatures.description: Indicates whether the token has permission-based access controls.

ContractFeatures.name: Premint
ContractFeatures.description: Allows a predefined number of tokens to be minted at deployment.

ContractFeatures.name: Supply Control
ContractFeatures.description: Allows for adjusting the supply of the token.

ContractFeatures.name: Token Recovery
ContractFeatures.description: Enables recovering lost tokens under specific conditions.

ContractFeatures.name: Reflections
ContractFeatures.description: Enables passive income distribution to holders based on transaction volume.

ContractFeatures.name: Symbol
ContractFeatures.description: The short symbol representing the token (e.g., ETH, BTC).

ContractFeatures.name: Tax
ContractFeatures.description: Applies a transaction tax that may be distributed, burned, or allocated.

ContractFeatures.name: Upgradeability
ContractFeatures.description: Indicates whether the token contract can be upgraded.

ContractFeatures.name: URI
ContractFeatures.description: Defines a unique resource identifier for metadata storage.

ContractFeatures.name: URI Storage
ContractFeatures.description: Allows storage and management of URIs for metadata.

ContractFeatures.name: Votes
ContractFeatures.description: Enables governance voting mechanisms for token holders.
